file_insights.description: Updated skeleton grid layout from fixed 6-column layout to responsive grid with breakpoints
file_insights.technical_detail: Changed gridTemplateColumns from 'repeat(6, 1fr)' to responsive object with xs: repeat(2, 1fr), md: repeat(3, 1fr), lg: repeat(6, 1fr)

patterns_discovered.description: Using MUI's sx prop with breakpoint-based responsive values for responsive layouts
patterns_discovered.benefit: Provides mobile-first responsive design with progressive enhancement for larger screens

patterns_discovered.pattern_name: Skeleton Loading States with Responsive Layout
patterns_discovered.description: Skeleton components used in loading states should match the responsive behavior of actual content
patterns_discovered.implementation: Updating skeleton placeholder grid to use same responsive layout as production grid
patterns_discovered.benefit: Ensures consistent visual experience during loading across all screen sizes

gotchas_discovered.description: Placeholder skeletons were using fixed column layout while actual content grid may be responsive, causing visual inconsistency during loading
gotchas_discovered.prevention: Always ensure skeleton loading states use identical responsive behavior as their corresponding content components

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully implemented responsive grid layout for InspectionsPage skeleton loading component
approach_outcome.execution: Direct modification approach - single-line change applying MUI breakpoint-based responsive values to gridTemplateColumns property
approach_outcome.verification: Code change aligns with responsive design best practices using MUI's breakpoint system (xs, md, lg)

recommendations.recommendation: Audit other skeleton loading states in the codebase for similar responsive layout mismatches
recommendations.rationale: This pattern likely exists in other components with grid layouts

recommendations.recommendation: Consider creating a reusable SkeletonGrid component with responsive props
recommendations.rationale: Would ensure consistency and reduce repetition of responsive grid logic across the application

recommendations.recommendation: Document MUI breakpoint responsive patterns used in the project
recommendations.rationale: Helps maintain consistency and reduces onboarding time for new developers
